Package controller

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ClientController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientControllerClientInterface, ClientControllerNetworkInterface
    public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientControllerClientInterface, ClientControllerNetworkInterface
    This class is the class which interacts directly with the user, in the distributed system It'll be separated from the other parts of the controlle by the network layer This class is used to store the data needed to the client and to send him notification. This is the only access used by the View to receive messages and to query the Server.
    See Also:
    ClientControllerClientInterface, ClientControllerNetworkInterface

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientController

        public ClientController​(boolean socket,
                        boolean cli,
                        java.lang.String networkAddress,
                        boolean normalMode)
                 throws java.rmi.NotBoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Builder of the class. This generates the View (view.cli or GUI) and the Network (Socket or RMI), depending by the choices of the user.
        Parameters:
        socket - true if a socket connection is required. False if a RMI connection is required
        cli - true if Cli is required. False is Gui is required
        networkAddress - Contains the address used by the Network to connect with the Server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.NotBoundException
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • attachView

        public void attachView​(View view)
        Method used by the View to notify its presence. Once the view is connected all the messages are sent to her.
        Specified by:
        attachView in interface ClientControllerClientInterface
        Parameters:
        view - The view that want to receive the messages.

      • login

        public void login​(java.lang.String username1,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String color)
        Description copied from interface: ClientControllerClientInterface
        This method is used to allow a Client to register to the Server for the first time
        Specified by:
        login in interface ClientControllerClientInterface
        Parameters:
        username1 - The username chosen by the User. It must be unique
        password - The password used to allow reconnection after timeout/disconnection
        color - The color chosen by the User

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Description copied from interface: ClientControllerClientInterface

      • pick

        public void pick​(java.lang.String id,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
        Description copied from interface: ClientControllerClientInterface
        This method is called by the View to notify the Server that a new choice has been made.
        Specified by:
        pick in interface ClientControllerClientInterface
        Parameters:
        id - Contains the type of the action to be performed and an identifier of the action.
        choices - A list containing all the index of elements that have been chosen. PickTarget and PickAction only analyze the first element of the List.
